The fighting is currently limited to the Adigrat region, on Eriteria's border, and the A2 highway. Reports of clashes in Mekelle are false. The TPLF-D faction leader, Debretsion, says the offensive was to prevent Addis Ababa from invading Eritrea's Abbas region, which would turn the 'Tigray region into a battleground'.Tensions between Ethiopia and Eritrea were very high, with Eriterian media speculating Ethiopia could soon launch an invasion. The TPLF-D and TPLF-M operation has seemingly created a 'buffer zone' between the two countries.Therefore, was this Eriteria's preemptive attack against Ethiopia?

Title: ↩️ 🇸🇾🇮🇱⚡- Alawite leaders' letter to the government of Israel...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇸🇾🇮🇱⚡- -Syrian Alawite leaders have sent a joint urgent letter to the Prime Minister and Defense Minister of Israel requesting protection from the Syrian government,- - Guy Azriel, journalist for i24. 🇸🇾🇮🇱⚡- Alawite leaders' letter to the government of Israel:-We, the Alawite clerics, issue the following statement after our meeting in one of the coastal villages:After the fall of the Assad regime and the assumption of power in Syria by an extremist Islamic group that adopts killing, kidnapping, displacement, and intimidation as a method and way to rule and dominate, and after the massacres and violations that occurred in the Alawite areas against their people in Tartus, Latakia, Homs, Hama, and the crimes of ethnic genocide, the State of Israel spoke the truth and echoed the truth and condemned these criminal acts.We declare our demand from the government of Israel, represented by its Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, to provide protection, assistance, aid and support, because the entire world has been silent about our injustice, and we have only heard a voice from the State of Israel condemning the crimes committed by the Damascus government against the Alawites, and for that we thank it.We say to the Jewish state, we extend our hands to you and we will be your best and most loyal friends, so that you can rid us of this extremist Islamic rule that will be a place for training and preparing groups from which they will launch their fight against you. In the past, you have suffered from the Islamists and known their crimes, and the treacherous terrorists of Islamic terrorism are the best example of the Hamas movement and terrorism as an example of terrorism and terror. And the Hamas movement is establishing a base in Syria that will be a launching point for action against you.Let us unite against the Islamic tide led by Turkey. My sons of David, your origin is gold, if you reach the Syrian coast, you will be welcomed with songs and flowers. May God bless the honorable State of Israel, its great leaders and its free and honorable people.We would like to thank Israeli Foreign Minister Gideon Sa’ar for his words about the Alawites.-

Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces have advanced across the Kursk reg...

Title: ↩️ 🇺🇸🇺🇦 - Ukrainian outlet, Kiev Independent, confirms Trump'...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇺🇸🇺🇦⚡- Trump's team hold secret talks with Zelensky’s Ukrainian opposition. The talks were held with Yulia Tymoshenko, a Ukrainian political veteran, and Petro Poroshenko, former Ukrainian President. 🇺🇸🇺🇦 - Ukrainian outlet, Kiev Independent, confirms Trump's team held secret talks with Ukrainian opposition figures on holding elections, in a bid to remove Zelensky from power.The talks were held with former Prime Minister, Yulia Tymoshenko, a veteran of Ukrainian politics. Tymoshenko belongs to the Batkivshchyna, a far-right conservative party. The party is far more anti-Russia than Zelensky's Servant of the Peoples Party.Trump's team also spoke with Poroshenko, the former President of Ukraine, and post-Maidan President. Poroshenko's popularity in Ukraine plummeted after the 'Roshen Chocolate Company' scandal. Poroshenko's government was believed to have been influenced by Ukraine's far-right sectors, which was evident by several appointments he had made. Such as Azov-linked Avakov as Interior Minister, and Troyan as Kiev's Chief of Police (a former Azov Commander). Both figures are unpopular, and unlikely to replace Zelensky in an election. With the only real candidate of succeeding Zelensky being Zaluzhny. Zaluzhny will end up proving more difficult to negotiate with than Zelensky. The US witnessed Zaluzhny's stubbornness during Ukraine's '2023 Counteroffensive', when Zaluzhny blasted NATO's tactics as 'obsolete' after multiple failed attacks. Instead launched his own tactics, and saw mild success.All three opposition figures have rejected calls for an early election in Ukraine.

Title: 🖼 🕊 Happy Ash Wednesday from the RN Admin Team! 🇻🇦 As we begi...
Description: 🕊 Happy Ash Wednesday from the RN Admin Team! 🇻🇦As we begin this sacred season of Lent, we are reminded that -you are dust, and to dust you shall return- (Genesis 3:19). Today, the ashes on our foreheads call us to repentance, prayer, fasting, and almsgiving, drawing us closer to Christ.May your Lenten journey be a time of renewal, grace, and deeper faith as we prepare our hearts for Easter. We hope this time is filled with humility and hope, seeking God's mercy and striving to grow in our personal holiness for all of our followers.

Title: ↩️ 🇺🇦 - Dubinsky, an independent, was previously part of Zelens...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇺🇦⚡- BREAKING: Oleksandr Dubinsky, Ukrainian Rada Deputy, in an address to the Rada Speaker demands to begin the impeachment of President Zelensky. 🇺🇦 - Dubinsky, an independent, was previously part of Zelensky's Servant of the People Party. Dubinsky, while working for '1+1 Channel', offered a very positive coverage of Zelensky in the lead-up to the 2019 elections. The two have since fallen out over Dubinsky's strong opposition towards the Ukrainian far-right and over Dubinsky's ties to Ihor Kolomoyskyi.Note, Kolomoyskyi, a former Ukrainian-Israeli oligarch, was stripped of his Ukrainian citizenship by Zelensky. Kolomoyskyi had long been accused corruption and of forming and financing anti-Maidan units in 2014, such as the 'Dnepr Gangs', which clashed with Azov on several occasions. Several Azov-linked politicians (such as Interior Minister Avakov) led for the nationalization of Kolomoyskyi's PrivatBank. Kolomoyskyi took the Poroshenko government to court in return. Kolomoyskyi was a large donor to 1+1 Channel, which Dubinsky worked for.

Piker has called for violence before and not been penalized as Twitch staff are fans of his however the company is under the Jeff Bezos umbrella and he may be finally cracking down on the platform.Bezos recently ordered his Washington Post to reign in their opinion section from being anti capitalist and over the top anti-Trump as they have been for years now, it is possible he is going to order Twitch to change their site rules to allow free expression alongside a crackdown on leftist streamers who have effectively run the site since the end of the 2010s.

On the first day of the outline, half of the hostages, both alive and dead, will be released, and at the end – if an agreement is reached on a permanent ceasefire – the remaining hostages, both alive and dead, will be released.While Hamas has repeatedly violated the agreement, Israel is not in violation. According to the agreement, Israel can return to fighting after the 42nd day if it feels that the negotiations are ineffective. This clause was supported by a side letter from the previous US administration and has also received the support of the Trump administration.While Israel agreed to the Witkoff outline with the aim of returning our abductees, Hamas has so far stuck to its refusal to accept this outline.If Hamas changes its position, Israel will immediately enter into negotiations on all the details of the Witkoff plan.-

From the east, Ukrainian troops have reached the center of Toretsk city, taking positions in the central high-rise buildings, we have geolocated recent footage to confirm the advance. Ukrainian forces also attempted to storm Toretsk Soccer Stadium, but have so far failed.From the west, Ukraine launched separate attacks north of Zabalka district. Ukrainian forces have begun attacking the town of Shcherbinovka too.Russian troops are launching counterattacks to prevent Ukraine from regaining strategic positions, but have so far failed.

Title: 🔁 The Tulkarm Brigade has denied responsibility for yesterday’s ...
Description: Forwarded From AMK MappingThe Tulkarm Brigade has denied responsibility for yesterday’s Tel Aviv bus bombings, contradicting claims made by several sources. The Tulkarm brigade used to be subordinated under the Al-Quds brigades (the armed wing of the Palestinian Islamic Jihad), but became its own armed group in 2022. It is based in the West Bank city of Tulkarm. They are currently engaged in clashes with Israeli special forces who are attempting to clear the Tulkarm Refugee camp and the Nour Shams refugee camp.

Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦 - Kurakhovo direction update: Russian forces have b...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: Photo 🇷🇺🇺🇦 - Kurakhovo direction update:Russian forces have begun clearing the Kurakhovo pocket, however reports of the pocket being completely cleared are false. A source from the Russian 68th Tank Brigade tells Rerum Novarum that they are still waiting along the outskirts of Dachnoe, as small Ukrainian pockets remain in the trenches and tree-lines west of the town.Front-line sources, from Ukraine and Russia, state that the trapped Ukrainian personnel in the Kurakhovo pocket, west of Dachnoe, might be the infamous and very well experienced Ukrainian 79th Brigade 'Cyborgs'. This report remains unconfirmed at the moment.Reports of Russian forces capturing the entirety of Ulakly are pure fiction. A source from the Russian 38th Brigade, the very unit that's fighting there, tells Rerum Novarum that they just managed to position themselves in the southern outskirts of the town.Russian forces stormed Konstantinopol from the south early morning, creating a landing platform in the southeast of the town. Russian forces have also successfully crossed the Volcha river and are pressuring the Ukrainian force in the town from the north too.In Andreevka, battles continue in the west of the town. 80% of the large town is under Russian control, but sources tell Rerum Novarum that advancing here has become difficult as Ukrainian forces have destroyed most infrastructure, including the houses. Russian units are instead focusing on the large trench network north of the town.

We all also welcomed President Trump's demand for the release of our hostages by Saturday noon, and we all also welcomed the president's revolutionary vision for the future of Gaza. In light of Hamas' announcement of its decision to violate the agreement and not release our hostages, last night I ordered the IDF to gather forces inside and around the Gaza Strip. This operation is being carried out at this time. It will be completed in the very near future.The decision that I passed unanimously in the cabinet is this:If Hamas does not return our hostages by Saturday noon - the ceasefire will end, and the IDF will return to intense fighting until Hamas is finally defeated.-
